name: SAMBA-ilum
summary: The SAMBA code is an open-source, high-throughput Python workflow for generating, simulating, and analyzing twisted bilayers. It features modules for: (i) creating thousands of quasi-commensurate structures via the coincidence lattice method; (ii) assist in the running DFT calculations using VASP; and (iii) extracting and organizing structural, electronic, and energetic properties into a robust dataset.
author: Augusto de Lelis Araujo
